attributes.title: PLEASE REMOVE

attributes.title: Nasty Cheeto puff 🤮🤢
attributes.review: Hello Cheeto love I tried to download this app to see all of the Cheeto Look-alikes but instead I got one big Cheeto puff🤮. Then it took 3.9999 weeks to download I am so disappointed 👎👎. When the app finally downloaded my phone would start glitching but only when I opened this app all of my other ones would work perfectly fine. So when it finally started working it would ask for my information like ummm I do not want to be tracked. Then it would make me do things like eat my dogs poop, eat grass and the worst of all it made me DELETE TIKTOK!!!!!! This app is garbage 🤮🤢🗑. Honestly I wish I could give this app a negative rating. And every time I open up the app all I see is a nasty looking orange Cheeto puff looking man that gives me nightmares every night. SO DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Took NINE HOURS to download then as soon as I opened it,it closed.The format and colors gave me I SEIZURE ( I'm epileptic).Then when my seizure stopped I looked at the app and saw that it doesn't even do that much.God such a useless app.I would rather get the same horrific spay tan as Trump than use this app ever again🤢.I would rather listen to Kayleigh McEnany try to defend one of your RACIST tweets than use this app ever again💩. I would rather get pepper sprayed,maced,and shot with rubber bullets than use this app ever again✌️🧚✨.I would rather listen to your stupid,brainwashed followers try to defend not wearing a mask than use this app again.😊

attributes.title: -430/69 😏 I hate this app 😡
attributes.review: This app is absolutely disgusting, you guys are all about all lives matter but then Donald Trump gets his own app? Like what🤬? Where’s everyones apps, all apps matter y’know. And to think he needs his own app when he’s on tv 24/7 that’s just a bit greedy. Not to mention his spray tan is HORRENDOUS😭👎, I wanna know who did it so that I can leave them a bad review too. Although I do feel bad for them because they have to seem him naked🤮🤮, they’re probably all scarred for life, bless their souls 👼🙏. Don’t even get me STARTED🤚 on the side affects this app has had on me! It’s made me go on Amazon and look at trump flags 🤢, not to mention I’ve started looking like a 70 year old man who likes to look at young girls feet👁👄🦶🏻👁, I used to be so good at arguing🗣 but now I can’t make a point, and call everyone snowflakes❄️ and they should use facts over emotions📠👆😀😭. I have also started watch Fox News📺 religiously and think they make a lot of good points which is weird because they don’t 🙅‍♀️! Anyhoo Trump 2020 but on a gravestone💁‍♀️😵🔪⚰️.

attributes.title: HACKED MY PHONE!!!
attributes.review: THIS APP HACKED MY PHONE!!! When i downloaded it, my phone automatically started playing videos of the rick roll youtube video and it would not stop!!! i was trying to put my baby to sleep but it kept waking my 3 year old up to which he started doing the boogie woogie!! that is unacceptable because a child needs their sleep and the music wouldn't stop playing!! In addition, it also gave me an option to allow the Chinese government to see through my phone which is so ridiculous !! PLEASE GET THIS APP OFF THE APP STORE THIS IS DISGUSTING
